definition: to be stupid/to cheat or deceive/me or I (modest)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Just my two cents' worth based on forty years' wandering around observing with eyes and ears open.
sentences.chinese: 这只是在下基于四十多年所见所闻的一点愚见，呵呵。

sentences.english: But in my humble opinion, it might be attributed to the paper writing.
sentences.chinese: 然以鄙人愚见，或许可归因于论文之过。

sentences.english: In my opinion, there are actually two root reasons.
sentences.chinese: 依我愚见，实际上存在两个根本原因。

definition: to venture to/to presume to/to take the liberty of
to just talk for the sake of talking
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
(courteous) to be so bold as to
(humble expr.) of humble talent and shallow learning (idiom); Pray forgive my ignorance,...
lies/wild talk/to tell lies/to talk nonsense/fantasy (literature)
to jump to an unfounded conclusion
